Package com.yelpdataset

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    This is the main entry point of the second program.
    BusinessCityRetriever
    This class is responsible for fetching the city of business as per the Geo-code (i.e.
    CityWiseDataSeparator
    This class separates the Yelp data (only restaurant) according to different cities.
    LuceneIndexCreator
    This class creates Lucene index of reviews for every city.
    LuceneWriter
    This class is responsible for writing a review with id and text in a particular lucene index.
    ReviewStatsExtractor
    This class is responsible for extracting out the stats that are required for calculation of Review Weight like Useful Votes, Date, Text Length etc.
    TermStatComparator
    This is comparator class which for Term Stats
    TopFrequencyWordsRetiever
    This class is responsible for extracting top 1000 highest frequency words from Lucene index for each city.
    UserStatsExctractor
    This class is responsible for extracting out the stats that are required for calculation of User Weight like Useful Votes, No.
    WordScoreCalculator
    This class is responsible for calculating the score for each word.
